description.p: Gets the day after the specified date or datetime value.
Returns the day after the specified date or datetime value.

discussion.p: The NextDay function computes the day after the specified date or datetime value.

example.caption: NextDay() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 CurrentDateTime() AS Now, NextDay(CurrentDateTime()) AS Expr1 FROM Orders =10/10/2019 12:48:35 00 pm|10/11/2019 12:48:35 00 pm
